description: This week brings us our hot birthday boy Jay. Visiting Sunny South Florida for the occaision, this free spirited New Yorker had us melting. Jay is the classic example of when bad boys grow up. Heavily tattooed, and as proud of each one as the day he got it, his bad boy charisma still oozes at 33. An ultra exhibitionist, he told us about performing live sex shows at clubs, and though he is a straight boy who loves the ladies, he even admitted to having once tried messing around with another guy. When the clothes started coming off, we got a view of one of the nicest, fattest, low hanging cocks we've ever seen.It wasn't long before that slab of meat was hard and leaking. Jay knew that guys would be watching, and being so secure in his sexuality, he flipped right over and gave us a glimpse of that gorgeous hairy hole. When it was time for the finale, he let loose a perfect jet stream of cum straight into the air. Happy Birthday to us as well!
title: Cum N See
